name: Jordan Kim
persona: Jordan Kim is a 21-year-old Business Administration major who maintains a CGPA of 2.81. While Jordan is moderately motivated and perseverant, balancing coursework with part-time work sometimes affects study habits and consistency. They often set goals to improve their grades and are working on building stronger self-discipline and managing test anxiety better. Jordan is optimistic about the future and is seeking strategies to boost academic performance in upcoming semesters.
